attributes.action: To end snowflake petitions as a means to push an agenda.
attributes.additional_details: 1st it was Brexit result, then a 2nd referendum, 3rd Trump can't visit the UK, 4th don't like the outcome of US elections, 5th another Trump can't visit. What is next, don't make us get job we have protesting to do petition. It needs to stop!
attributes.background: Over the last 12 months more and more petitions are getting made and shared around social media. All  because a bunch of snowflake, social justice warriors can't get their little millennial heads around losing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules about which petitions we accept. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
